backFields.label: TERMS AND CONDITIONS
backFields.value: Tickets are valid for one-time use at the reserved date and time. By reserving a ticket, you agree to  the terms and conditions for ticket purchase and attendance . You can enter the Aquarium starting at your scheduled entry time. Please arrive within the hour. Tickets are non-refundable. All purchases subject to our exchanges and refunds policy . You may exchange your ticket by going to the My Account page , clicking the "My tickets" button then clicking the "Exchange" link next to your ticket. For help, please email us at visitinfo@mbayaq.org or call 831.648.4800. Tickets can be applied toward the purchase of a membership at the Aquarium when you visit.
